# This file was generated by GENERATOR

include( FetchContent )

FetchContent_Declare(
  Catch2
  GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2.git
  GIT_TAG v3.4.0
)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable( Catch2 )

add_executable( iced_x86_tests
  test_decoder.cpp
  test_decoder_manual.cpp
  test_instruction.cpp
  test_encoder.cpp
  test_comprehensive.cpp
)

target_link_libraries( iced_x86_tests
  PRIVATE
    iced_x86
    Catch2::Catch2WithMain
)

include( CTest )
include( Catch )
catch_discover_tests( iced_x86_tests )
